医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Insilico Medicine 利用人工智能发现新型 SIK2 抑制剂Insilico Medicine（“Insilico”）是一家临床阶段的端到端生成人工智能（AI）药物发现公司，在多种生成人工智能模型和AlphaFold结构在药物发现的应用方面取得了重大突破。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Insilico-Medicine-uses-AI-to-discover-novel-SIK2-inhibitors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Insilico-Medicine-uses-AI-to-discover-novel-SIK2-inhibitors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2fd866b8-7cf1-4150-a9bf-e143fb302b66 Wed, 02 Aug 2023 13:36:04 -0400 Insilico Medicine uses AI to discover novel SIK2 inhibitors
研究发现，高体重指数会增加乳腺癌患者心脏毒性的风险过去几十年来，哥伦比亚的乳腺癌存活率有了显着提高，但增加患者出现心血管副作用（如心脏毒性）可能性的因素尚不清楚，也没有得到很好的治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/High-BMI-increases-risk-of-cardio毒性-in-breast-cancer-病人-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/High-BMI-increases-risk-of-cardio毒性-in-breast-cancer-病人-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5714365b-1f43-401a-ac5c-5855fbd475b8 Wed, 02 Aug 2023 13:29:12 -0400 High BMI increases risk of cardiotoxicity in breast cancer patients, study finds
受免疫系统启发的新型分子可灭活多种病毒众所周知，抗病毒疗法的开发非常困难，因为病毒可以迅速突变而对药物产生耐药性。但是，如果新一代抗病毒药物忽略病毒表面快速突变的蛋白质，而是破坏其保护层呢？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Novel-molecules-inspired-by-the-immune-system-inactivate-several-viruses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Novel-molecules-inspired-by-the-immune-system-inactivate-several-viruses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bcc65503-899b-4b91-96a7-fb003ce1ce37 Wed, 02 Aug 2023 13:13:50 -0400 Novel molecules inspired by the immune system inactivate several viruses
美国心脏协会表彰 2,671 家致力于心血管患者护理的医疗保健组织美国心脏协会是追求更长寿、更健康世界的不懈力量，已认可 2,671 个医疗保健和应急响应组织：比 2022 年增加近 145 个 -；以表彰他们致力于通过基于证据的高效和协调的护理来改善心血管患者的健康结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/American-Heart-Association-recognizes-2671-health-care-organizations-for-commitment-to-cardioangio-eptic-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/American-Heart-Association-recognizes-2671-health-care-organizations-for-commitment-to-cardioangio-eptic-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0990760b-023d-4c2d-8add-cac8e4ddf6df Wed, 02 Aug 2023 12:58:21 -0400 American Heart Association recognizes 2,671 health care organizations for commitment to cardiovascular patient care
TTUHSC 研究人员获得 176 万美元资助，用于研究新的胰腺癌治疗方法胰腺导管腺癌（PDAC）的存活率仅为个位数，具有高度致命性。事实上，当 PDAC 被临床诊断时，高达 90% 的患者已被认为无法通过手术或其他方式治愈。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/TTUHSC-researcher-receives-24176-million-grant-to-investigate-new-pancreatic-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/TTUHSC-researcher-receives-24176-million-grant-to-investigate-new-pancreatic-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0d9b8467-028a-46a9-8dda-12ae26ecc10a Wed, 02 Aug 2023 12:47:35 -0400 TTUHSC researcher receives $1.76 million grant to investigate new pancreatic cancer treatment
识别风险和解决方案：研究揭示了预防 COVID-19 的相关性研究确定了接受三剂辉瑞 BNT162b2 疫苗的健康个体的保护相关性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Identifying-risks-and-solutions-study-uncovers-correlates-of-protection-against-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Identifying-risks-and-solutions-study-uncovers-correlates-of-protection-against-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b3e9e863-0533-435a-9447-2a8cb391bc32 Wed, 02 Aug 2023 11:00:00 -0400 Identifying risks and solutions: study uncovers correlates of protection against COVID-19
类肽抗病毒疗法在实验室测试中灭活了三种病毒正如细菌可以产生抗生素耐药性一样，病毒也可以逃避药物治疗。开发针对这些微生物的疗法很困难，因为病毒经常变异或隐藏在细胞内。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Peptoid-antiviral-therapy-inactivates- Three-viruses-in-lab-tests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Peptoid-antiviral-therapy-inactivates- Three-viruses-in-lab-tests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b75b0dd7-f305-4417-af6a-d314e84eb9fb Wed, 02 Aug 2023 10:45:24 -0400 Peptoid antiviral therapy inactivates three viruses in lab tests
对于不运动的成年人来说，剧烈的间歇性体力活动是否与癌症发生有关？研究人员评估了设备监控、VILPA 与癌症之间的关系https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Does-vigorous-intermittent-lifestyle-physical-activity-have-an-association-with-incident-cancer-among-nonexercising-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Does-vigorous-intermittent-lifestyle-physical-activity-have-an-association-with-incident-cancer-among-nonexercising-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c829ac4d-5edd-4bc6-b949-95153a9ccc52 Wed, 02 Aug 2023 10:38:00 -0400 Does vigorous intermittent lifestyle physical activity have an association with incident cancer among nonexercising adults?
研究评估了早期 COVID-19 感染的预测生物标志物的价值研究人员表明，某些生物标志物可能比其他生物标志物更能预测 COVID-19。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Study-asseses-the-value-of-predictive-biomarkers-for-early-stage-COVID-19-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Study-asseses-the-value-of-predictive-biomarkers-for-early-stage-COVID-19-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=66a85794-b4c1-4f4e-895c-81112338d9b4 Wed, 02 Aug 2023 10:29:00 -0400 Study assesses the value of predictive biomarkers for early-stage COVID-19 infection
回顾维生素 E 摄入量或循环 α-生育酚与各种健康结果之间关系的研究在最近的一项研究中，研究人员利用荟萃分析研究了维生素 E 或循环 α-生育酚摄入量与健康结果之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Review-studies-relationships- Between-vitamin-E-intake-or-circulate-ceb1-tocopherol-and-various-health-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Review-studies-relationships- Between-vitamin-E-intake-or-circulate-ceb1-tocopherol-and-various-health-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7dd66e0a-8cc8-402d-a2c7-b0a3bde4affe Wed, 02 Aug 2023 10:24:00 -0400 Review studies relationships between vitamin E intake or circulating α-tocopherol and various health outcomes
